Class POIPrinterManager

java.lang.Object

public class POIPrinterManager extends Object

      Printer status code. Printer is overheated.

      Printer status code. Printer has no paper.

      public static final int STATUS_NO_PRINTER

  • Constructor Details

    • POIPrinterManager

      public POIPrinterManager(android.content.Context context)
      Constructs a new instance of the printer manager.
      Parameters:
      context - Application context

  • Method Details

    • open

      public void open()
      Opens the printer.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - when printer binding fails.

    • continuePrint

      public void continuePrint(boolean restart)
      Continues the printing process if it was stopped due to overheating or being out of paper.
      Parameters:
      restart - true to restart from the beginning, false to continue.

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes and releases the printer.

    • getPrinterState

      public int getPrinterState()
      Gets the current printer status.
      Returns:
      Printer status code.

    • setPrintType

      public void setPrintType(String type)
      Sets the print type.
      Parameters:
      type - "00" for normal print, "01" for label print.

    • setPrintGray

      public void setPrintGray(int gray)
      Sets the printing grayscale value. Default value is 1200. The smaller the value, the lighter the color.
      Parameters:
      gray - Grayscale value. Value range [300, 5000].

    • setPrintRed

      public void setPrintRed(int red)
      Sets the red scale value.
      Parameters:
      red - Red scale value.

    • setPrintFont

      public void setPrintFont(String path)
      Sets the print font with a path to a font.
      Parameters:
      path - System file path to font. Example: /system/fonts/DroidSansMono.ttf.

    • setPrintFontAssets

      public void setPrintFontAssets(String path)
      Sets the print font with an asset name. Only the font file name needs to be passed as the parameter.

      Example: setPrintFontAssets("Android-1.ttf");

      Parameters:
      path - Assets resource file directory. Font file storage directory: assets/fonts/Android-1.ttf.

    • getFont

      public String getFont()
      Gets the current set font file path.
      Returns:
      File path to font.

    • setLineSpace

      public void setLineSpace(int line)
      Sets line spacing.
      Parameters:
      line - Line space value.

    • cleanCache

      public void cleanCache()
      Cleans added printing data.

    • addPrintLine

      public void addPrintLine(PrintLine line)
      Adds a single TextPrintLine or BitmapPrintLine to the printing data.
      Parameters:
      line - TextPrintLine or BitmapPrintLine object.

    • addPrintLine

      public void addPrintLine(List<TextPrintLine> line)
      Adds multiple TextPrintLine to a relative layout.
      Parameters:
      line - List of TextPrintLine objects.

    • addLinearPrintLine

      public void addLinearPrintLine(List<TextPrintLine> line)
      Adds multiple TextPrintLine to a linear layout.
      Parameters:
      line - List of TextPrintLine objects.

    • addBlankView

      public void addBlankView(int line)
      Adds blank lines.
      Parameters:
      line - Number of blank lines.

    • setBlankViewPixel

      public void setBlankViewPixel(int pixel)
      Sets pixels for blank lines.
      Parameters:
      pixel - Number of pixels for each blank line.

    • beginPrint

      public void beginPrint(POIPrinterManager.IPrinterListener printerListener)
      Starts printing the added data.
      Parameters:
      printerListener - listener for printing events (start, finish, and error).

    • lineWrap

      public void lineWrap(int value)
      Prints blank lines at data start. Uses a fixed line height.
      Parameters:
      value - Number of blank lines.

    • lineWrapPixels

      public void lineWrapPixels(int value)
      Prints blank lines at data start. The height of each line is set by the setLineWrapPixels() method.
      Parameters:
      value - Number of blank lines.

    • setLineWrapPixels

      public void setLineWrapPixels(int value)
      Sets pixels for blank lines.
      Parameters:
      value - Numbers of pixels for each blank line.

    • getPrinterLength

      public double getPrinterLength()
      Gets the total length of the printed data.
      Returns:
      Total length of the printed data.

    • getBeforePrinterLength

      public double getBeforePrinterLength()
      Gets the total length of data before printing.
      Returns:
      Total length of data before printing.
